attributes.additional_details: Nigel Farage has been the single most successful political figure of this generation. He has single handedly bought about everything he set out to bring about at great personal cost to himself and at great personal safety. He has been the biggest political influencer of this generation without even being elected to any official office.
attributes.background: Give Nigel Farage a Knighthood for his services to the British people and British politics.

rejection.details:
The Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
